sig_info: If an Opponent ability fails due to his personal immunity or reduced Ability Accuracy they take a burst of 4.2 to 25.2 Physical Damage and the Overseer gains one Gamma Power. This Damage scales with Base Attack Only. This effect has a 1 second cooldown.
Striking the Opponent while they are recovering from Heavy or Specials Attacks deal a burst of 8.4 to 67.2 Physical Damage. This effect has a 1 second cooldown.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Immune to Nullify, Fateseal and Stagger effects.
An enhanced immune system provides full immunity to the Poisons of the Battlerealm.
GAMMA POWER: When the Opponent gains a Bar of Power gain an indefinite Gamma Power granting 12.6 Attack Rating and 17% Potency of his personal Debuffs from Specials. Max 6 Stacks.
COSMIC MODE: At 3 or more Stacks of Gamma Power, after launching a Special consumes all stacks and activates Cosmic Mode, lasting 3.33 second(s) per Gamma Power, but it is paused during Specials from the Overseer or the Opponent. Cosmic Mode lasts 50% longer for Defenders.

For each Gamma Power gained while in Cosmic Mode, instead gain a non-stacking Fury Buff granting 21 Attack Rating per Gamma Power used to enter the mode, with its total duration equalling its Cosmic Mode starting duration.
Light Attacks deal a Burst of 55.44 Physical Damage.
AFTER OPPONENT LAUNCHES A SPECIAL - SPEC: Inflict an indefinite Special Concussion Debuff, reducing Ability Accuracy by 10% during Special attacks. Max 7.
Reducing a Combo of 3 or more to a lower amount removes one stack of Special Concussion.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Inflict a non-stacking Taunt Debuff for 10 seconds, reducing their Attack Rating by 20%. This ability goes on cooldown for 20 second(s) if activated.
AFTER A SPECIAL - CAP\u2019S SHIELD: Gain an Auto-Block Passive, giving 100% chance to Auto-Block Basic Attacks when Struck twice, it lasts for 7 second(s) or until triggered.
The Overseer is Stun immune while Auto-Block is active.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Inflict a Stun Debuff for 1.50 second(s).
Cosmic Mode: On activation gain a Regeneration Buff, recovering 7% of missing Health over 10 seconds. The Potency of this Buff is reduced by 10% for each Bleed Debuff on Overseer.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Inflicts a Disorient Debuff, reducing Defensive Ability Accuracy by 40% and Block Proficiency by 50% for 12 second(s). Ability Accuracy reduction scales with Gamma Power.
Cosmic Mode: Gain an Energize Buff, granting 25% increased Combat Power Rate for 12 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Physical Vulnerability Debuff, reducing Physical Resistance by 533.33 for 20 seconds.

Cosmic Mode: On activation gain a Regeneration Buff, recovering 7% of missing Health over 10 seconds. The Potency of this Buff is reduced by 10% for each Bleed Debuff on Overseer.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Inflicts a Disorient Debuff, reducing Defensive Ability Accuracy by 40% and Block Proficiency by 50% for 12 second(s). Ability Accuracy reduction scales with Gamma Power.
Cosmic Mode: Gain an Energize Buff, granting 25% increased Combat Power Rate for 12 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Physical Vulnerability Debuff, reducing Physical Resistance by 666.67 for 20 seconds.

sig_info: If an Opponent ability fails due to his personal immunity or reduced Ability Accuracy they take a burst of 42.76 to 279.6 Physical Damage and the Overseer gains one Gamma Power. This Damage scales with Base Attack Only. This effect has a 1 second cooldown.
Striking the Opponent while they are recovering from Heavy or Specials Attacks deal a burst of 89.99 to 699 Physical Damage. This effect has a 1 second cooldown.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Immune to Nullify, Fateseal and Stagger effects.
An enhanced immune system provides full immunity to the Poisons of the Battlerealm.
GAMMA POWER: When the Opponent gains a Bar of Power gain an indefinite Gamma Power granting 104.85 Attack Rating and 17% Potency of his personal Debuffs from Specials. Max 6 Stacks.
COSMIC MODE: At 3 or more Stacks of Gamma Power, after launching a Special consumes all stacks and activates Cosmic Mode, lasting 3.33 second(s) per Gamma Power, but it is paused during Specials from the Overseer or the Opponent. Cosmic Mode lasts 50% longer for Defenders.

For each Gamma Power gained while in Cosmic Mode, instead gain a non-stacking Fury Buff granting 174.75 Attack Rating per Gamma Power used to enter the mode, with its total duration equalling its Cosmic Mode starting duration.
Light Attacks deal a Burst of 461.34 Physical Damage.
AFTER OPPONENT LAUNCHES A SPECIAL - SPEC: Inflict an indefinite Special Concussion Debuff, reducing Ability Accuracy by 10% during Special attacks. Max 7.
Reducing a Combo of 3 or more to a lower amount removes one stack of Special Concussion.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Inflict a non-stacking Taunt Debuff for 10 seconds, reducing their Attack Rating by 20%. This ability goes on cooldown for 20 second(s) if activated.
AFTER A SPECIAL - CAP\u2019S SHIELD: Gain an Auto-Block Passive, giving 100% chance to Auto-Block Basic Attacks when Struck twice, it lasts for 7 second(s) or until triggered.
